item.title: What Bible will Trump use at his inauguration? Not the one he endorsed.
item.description: The president-elect eschewed the star-spangled “Trump Bible” in favor of volumes with personal and national history.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds TikTok ban-or-sale law slated to start Sunday
item.description: Donald Trump had asked the Supreme Court to delay TikTok’s ban-or-sale law to give him an opportunity to act once he returns to the White House.

item.title: How moving Trump’s inauguration inside spurred an all-out scramble
item.description: The sudden weather-induced change forced a scramble for hundreds of thousands of people who had spent months planning for the swearing-in of the natio...

item.title: Trump’s inauguration to be moved indoors due to extreme cold in Washington
item.description: The Senate is holding more confirmation hearings for President-elect Donald Trump’s Cabinet picks ahead of his return to office on Monday.

item.title: White House commissions review of coronavirus origins ahead of Trump’s arrival
